titles.title: Returning SBA to Main Street Act
Returning SBA to Main Street Act
Returning SBA to Main Street Act

A bill to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to relocate 30 percent of the employees assigned to headquarters to duty stations outside the Washington metropolitan area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Ernst with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 21.

committee.name: Senate Small Business and Entrepreneurship
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
